Name: 1 Have a wonderfully blessed day
ChorusText:
And don’t put a question mark where God puts a period.
The church is prayer conditioned.  When God ordains, He sustains
Suffering from the truth decay?  Brush on your Bible
Be ye fishers of men – you catch them and He’ll clean them
Give God what’s right – not what’s left.
Nothing else ruins the truth like stretching it.
In the sentence of life, the devil may be a comma-but never let him be the period
We don’t change God’s message – His message changes us
Most people want to serve God, but only in an advisory position.
Give satan an inch and he’ll be a ruler
Have a wonderfully blessed day!
Plan ahead – It wasn’t raining when Noah built the ark
Never give the devil a ride – he will always want to drive
He who kneels before God , you can stand before anyone.
Don’t wait for six strong men to take you to church
Worry is the darkroom in which negatives can develop
A lot of kneeling will keep you in good standing
Exposure to the Son may prevent burning
He who angers you controls you
Read the Bible – It will give you the knowledge that you need
When praying, don’t give God instructions – just report for duty
Exercise daily – walk with the Lord
Man’s way leads to a hopeless end – God’s way leads to an endless hope
Are you wrinkled with a burden? Come to the church for a face lift
WARNING:
Compassion is difficult to give away because it keeps coming back
God doesn’t call the qualified, He qualifies the called.
